name: OneRocketDefensePerMinute
title: One Rocket Defense Per Minute by DaveMcW
author: stringweasel
description:
This mod was written specifically for Alt-F4 #13. It mimics Factorio 0.11 to run an old One Rocket Defense Per Minute megabase built by DaveMcW. 

 Caution: using this mod on other saves will confuse your inserters, and maybe some other things!
